entry.title: Qualifications for Land Surveyors
entry.summary: Land surveying is a very rewarding and exciting career path - with no two days exactly the same. Land surveyors get the best of both worlds sharing their working day between the outdoors and the office. In this article and guide we shall look at land surveying qualifications and how you can get them. Land Surveying Qualifications at College Land surveyors require several qualifications before they can practice as land surveyors in the USA.
